title: Should We Abandon or Embrace New Year’s Resolutions?
sub_head: Students discuss what they plan to do differently in 2022.
body: Editor’s note: In this Future View, students discuss New Year’s resolutions. Next week we’ll ask, “How scared are you of the Omicron variant? How draconian should American institutions be, with the spread of this new form of Covid?” Students should click here to submit opinions of fewer than 250 words before Jan.11. The best responses will be published that night.
